## SavedObjectsClient.bulkGet property

Returns an array of objects by id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bulkGet: (objects?: {
        id: string;
        type: string;
    }[]) => Promise<SavedObjectsBatchResponse<SavedObjectAttributes>>;
```

## Example

bulkGet(\[ { id: 'one', type: 'config' }<!-- -->, { id: 'foo', type: 'index-pattern' } \])
